content: such a cute little gender-neutral baby cardigan jacket fully buttoned - and with long sleeves easy & quick to knit in a range of sizes ~ 0 - 3 months around 6 months 9 - 12 months 12 - 18 months requires ~ dk 8ply yarn 4mm needles 6 buttons **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
